channel.title: Medical Diagnosis on Hybrid Cloud Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in Medical Diagnosis on Hybrid Cloud Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the Medical Diagnosis pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift cluster (Go to the OpenShift console). Cluster must have a dynamic StorageClass to provision PersistentVolumes.

item.title: Cluster Sizing
item.description: OpenShift Cluster Sizing for the Medical Diagnosis Pattern Tested Platforms The Medical Diagnosis pattern has been tested in the following Certified Cloud Providers.

item.title: Troubleshooting Guide
item.description: Contents {: .no_toc} Understanding the Makefile The Makefile is the entrypoint for the pattern. We use the Makefile to bootstrap the pattern to the cluster.

item.title: Ideas for Customization
item.description: Ideas for Customization Why change it? One of the major goals of the Red Hat patterns development process is to create modular, customizable demos.
